com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser

Interface TokenComparator


  • public interface TokenComparator
    An interface for comparing two tokenised corpora, one of which is considered a reference.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(TokenEvaluationObserver observer) 
      void compare()
      Evaluate the evaluation corpus against the reference corpus.
      int getSentenceCount() 
      void setSentenceCount(int sentenceCount)
      If set, will limit the maximum number of sentences that will be evaluated.

    • Method Detail

      • compare

        void compare()
        Evaluate the evaluation corpus against the reference corpus.
        Parameters:
        reader - for reading manually tagged tokens from a corpus

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(TokenEvaluationObserver observer)

      • setSentenceCount

        void setSentenceCount(int sentenceCount)
        If set, will limit the maximum number of sentences that will be evaluated. Default is 0 = all sentences.
        Parameters:
        sentenceCount -
